title: Gazette issued detailing functions of ministries: Telecom, BOI comes under President
body_lines: Forty-two Department, Statutory Boards and State Corporations including the Sri Lanka Telecom, Board of Investment and the Colombo Port City Economic Commission has been gazetted under the Defence Ministry which is under President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
An extraordinary gazette notification has been issued detailing the duties and functions of the 23 ministries.

The gazette stated that all subjects and functions of Department, Statutory Boards and State Corporations which are not specifically assigned to a Minister will continue to be vested with the President.(DSB)
